name: TNIG
description:
Prototype of the game we're currently working on. Going to put development on pause for a little while due to seeking investors for the project. You can play only with a joystick, keyboard is not really supported. Hope you enjoy!

Just launched campaing trying to fund some money for art and animation work https://igg.me/at/v2hBnA-0I3k/x/20461851
